distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
libgcrypt was updated to fix one security issue.

This security issue was fixed:
- CVE-2015-7511: Side-channel attack on ECDH with Weierstrass curves (bsc#965902).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.title: Terms of use

notes.text: Libgcrypt before 1.6.5 does not properly perform elliptic-point curve multiplication during decryption, which makes it easier for physically proximate attackers to extract ECDH keys by measuring electromagnetic emanations.
notes.title: CVE description
